name: Nothing left for Jim!
description:
Have you ever wondered, who cleans up the mess, that our usual heros make?

Play as Jim, the construction worker and prepare a race track for another race to run.
The clou: He has to bring all items from the finish line back to the start line, so the race can start with nothing  left in his pockets. Can you beat the game in just 40 seconds? Because, if some items are not placed where they belong in time, you better run. Ha! Get it?!

Made for Ludum Dare 45
